title: An Unspecified Error has occured
body:
During the small patch the other day, my computer crashed and i have been unable to get the client to function properly since. I have gone through every guide i could find on the support site and have also gone through every step on [this](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues) thread 

I have run the hextech repair tool multiple time to no avail. I can get any logs needed i just can't attach them on this thread. I know it has nothing to do with my internet connection, since i have attempted on 2 different networks both of which have worked before. Any help is much appreciated.

replies.body: Getting that error this early on suggests a security setting preventing the patching from reading your game files.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help.  I'm concerned, though, because you should be on the updated client at this point.  Hopefully, those steps should get your updated to the latest version.  Let me know if that helps.

Hi Porocles,  me and some other players reported this bug as well, but even with all permissions granted and following the guide, it still doesn't work.

Are there any other solutions? 

Reinstalled the game already 3 to 4 times, gone through the guide multiple times.. nothing helps

Thanks for the info!  The issue can vary depending on when it's happening.  At what % are you getting the error?  Per the permissions guide, have you already tried a reinstall through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367)?  You guys will want to get onto the updated client as soon as possible, so you don't run into any problems come retirement.  Let me know!
I've tried with hextech repair tool but still doesn't work. Patching stucks first time around 50% and now at 74% .. What to do next ?

Hey there, your issue may be a bit different here.  That far into the patching process, the patcher already finished scanning your game files so it's not a permissions issue.  Instead, the patcher is trying to download updates but is backtracking or disconnecting entirely.  You'll want to go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tighten up your network to the patching server and get up to date.  I hope that helps!
Hi Porocles, tried that as well but still not working, keeps getting stuck between 60-80%.. Any other suggestions?

Those steps should usually fix up the error, so it's weird that it's still happening!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in this case, and our tech team will take a look with you.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to grab some logs, and attach it to your ticket.  We'll get back to you through your ticket as soon as we can!
Right now i'm manually removing the files from my hardrive and doing a clean reinstall. Will let you know if that works.
So far it is working. My client is actually updating. So there must be some sort of issue with a file in personal setting or something like that.
I went to unistall and noticed that League isn't even showing up on my programs list.
